selections.description: The currently selected values for the component. This can be a literal array of strings or a path to an array in the data model('path', e.g. '/hotel/options').

options.description: An array of available options for the user to choose from.

label.description: The text to display for this option. This can be a literal string or a reference to a value in the data model (e.g. '/option/label').

value.description: The value to be associated with this option when selected.

maxAllowedSelections.description: The maximum number of options that the user is allowed to select.
